title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 1, 2019
description: It was on this day in 1955, in Montgomery, Alabama, that Rosa Parks refused to give up her seat in the front of a bus to a white passenger.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1955, in Montgomery, Alabama, that Rosa Parks refused to give up her seat in the front of a bus to a white passenger.
